code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph Input[FinTech_LedgerService]
        CLI[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ConfigL[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ConfigP[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ImageL[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end
    
    subgraph Detection[FinTech_AuthVault]
        CircleD[FinTech_LedgerService]
        ConvexD[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ColorPal[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ColorSep[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        HistC[FinTech_AuthVault]
    end
    
    subgraph Color[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ColorExt[FinTech_AuthVault]
        ColorClust[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        BlackV[FinTech_LedgerService]
        CMYKAcc[FinTech_LedgerService]
        Calib[FinTech_AuthVault]
        FitM[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end
    
    subgraph Cluster[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        ClusterPC[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
        SlidingW[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
    end
    
    subgraph GPU[FinTech_LedgerService]
        GPUCore[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        GPURend[FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    end
    
    subgraph Render[FinTech_AuthVault]
        CircleR[FinTech_AuthVault]
        ClusterR[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        BlockR[FinTech_AuthVault]
        TreemapR[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end
    
    subgraph Output[FinTech_AuthVault]
        Formatter[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        ImageExt[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        Manifest[FinTech_FraudDetection]
        RunMgr[FinTech_TransactionQueue]
        Runs[FinTech_FraudDetection]
    end
    
    CLI --> ConfigL & ImageL
    ConfigL --> ConfigP
    ImageL -->|BGR| Detection
    
    CircleD -->|Standard Mode| ColorExt
    ConvexD -->|CMYK Mode| ClusterPC
    ColorSep --> ConvexD
    HistC --> ColorPal
    
    ColorExt --> ColorClust
    BlackV --> ConvexD
    CMYKAcc --> Render
    
    ClusterPC -->|ClusterResult| Render
    SlidingW -->|Per-Tile| ClusterPC
    
    GPUCore --> GPURend
    GPURend --> CircleR
    ClusterPC --> GPUCore
    
    CircleR & ClusterR & BlockR & TreemapR --> ImageExt
    
    Formatter --> Output
    ImageExt --> RunMgr
    Manifest --> RunMgr
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
